title: Julianne Moore dresses in head-to-toe black as she greets fans while shopping in the West Village
text:
Julianne Moore has led a successful career, with an Oscar, an Emmy and three Golden Globes to her name.

But the actress doesn't mind being stopped in the streets by her adoring fans every now and then.

She cut a chic fall look in black Thursday as she was spotted by some passersby in New York City.

Fall chic: Julianne Moore cut a chic fall look in black Thursday as she was spotted by some passersby in New York City

The 58-year-old sported a casual black wool coat with large pockets as she strolled through the West Village.

It was paired with some skintight black leggings and a pair of black sneakers with white soles over black socks with white stripes.

Moore completed the look with a pair of black wayfarers and a matching scarf wrapped around her neck.

She seemed to be in a hurry as she carried a shopping bag from Notes Du Nord while walking through the streets.

Scarf weather: Moore completed the look with a pair of black wayfarers and a matching scarf wrapped around her neck

Out and about: She seemed to be in a hurry as she carried a shopping bag from Notes Du Nord while walking through the streets. But she wasn't in too much of a hurry to stop for some adoring fans who recognized her

Fan girling: The Boogie Nights star stopped in the street and talked to a woman and her daughters

For the 'gram: They snapped a photo of Moore as she walked away, beaming from the brief interaction

But she wasn't in too much of a hurry to stop for some adoring fans who recognized her.

The Boogie Nights star stopped in the street and talked to a woman and her daughters.

They snapped a photo of Moore as she walked away, beaming from the brief interaction.

Moore recently reunited with designer Tom Ford at Vogue's Forces of Fashion conference.

She cut a bold look in a red velvet pantsuit over a matching turtleneck with platform stilettos.
description: Moore recently reunited with designer Tom Ford at Vogue's Forces of Fashion conference. She cut a bold look in a red velvet pantsuit over a matching turtleneck with platform stilettos.
